Segment.name: X1
Segment.comment: To transmit information contained on an export license

Field.name: CodeForLicensingCertificationRegistrationOrAccreditationAgency
Field.comment: Code identifying a licensing, certification, registration, or accreditation agency.

Field.name: ExportLicenseNumber
Field.comment: Government assigned identification number for exporter

Field.name: ExportLicenseStatusCode
Field.comment: Code defining whether the shipment completes the terms of the license, or the shipment is only a partial delivery relative to the license terms

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ExportLicenseSymbolCode
Field.comment: Code which specifies the export symbol marked on a shipment

Field.name: ExportLicenseControlCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of control applicable to the export license

Field.name: ScheduleBCode
Field.comment: Code identifying commodity number established for international statistical purposes

Field.name: InternationalDomesticCode
Field.comment: Code indicating international or domestic shipment

Field.name: LadingQuantity
Field.comment: Number of units (pieces) of the lading commodity

Field.name: LadingValue
Field.comment: Value of shipment for export, expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: ExportFilingKeyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of communications with customs

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitPrice
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: USGovernmentLicenseType
Field.comment: Code to identify the type of government license involved

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location
